REVIEW_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP HAIDARABAD_NNP SIR_NNP CAWASJEE_NNP JEHANGHIER_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYUM_NNP ,_, 1873-74_JJ ,_, BY_NNP DEPUTY_NNP SURGEON_NNP GENERAL_NNP MILLER_NNP ,_, AND_NNP OF_NNP LUNATICS_NNP TREATED_NNP OUT_NNP OF_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 46No_CD ._.
2732_CD of_IN 1874_CD ._.
FROM_IN THE_NNP SURGEON_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, INDIAN_NNP MEDICAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ,_, TO_NNP THIS_NNP ,_, SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, GENERAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, 4th_CD September_NNP 1874_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP on_IN the_DT Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1873-74_RB ._.
Government_NNP having_VBG laid_VBN down_RP in_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
1087_CD ,_, dated_VBD 15th_CD April_NNP 1874_CD ,_, that_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ thing_NN to_TO be_VB remembered_VBN is_VBZ that_IN all_DT statistical_JJ tables_NNS should_MD be_VB uniform_JJ ,_, a_DT series_NN of_IN tables_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN compiled_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ office_NN ,_, and_CC issued_VBN for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN the_DT officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS ._.
This_DT has_VBZ secured_VBN a_DT fair_JJ degree_NN of_IN uniformity_NN in_IN the_DT tables_NNS ,_, complete_JJ indeed_RB ,_, for_IN all_PDT the_DT asylums_NNS ,_, except_IN Kolaba_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT presence_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS necessitated_VBD some_DT additions_NNS to_TO the_DT number_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, whilst_RB making_VBG this_DT first_JJ attempt_NN at_IN uniformity_NN in_IN the_DT tables_NNS ,_, time_NN did_VBD not_RB admit_NN of_IN a_DT model_NN being_VBG framed_VBN upon_IN which_WDT the_DT reports_NNS of_IN the_DT superintendents_NNS should_MD be_VB based_VBN ._.
This_DT I_PRP shall_MD endeavour_VB to_TO arrange_VB in_IN future_JJ ._.
The_DT report_NN is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT following_JJ manner_NN :2_VBD The_DT two_CD together_RB give_VBP a_DT description_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT lunatics_NNS under_IN cognizance_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
The_DT report_NN of_IN each_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN its_PRP$ superintendent_NN ,_, and_CC each_DT Deputy_NNP Surgeon_NNP General_NNP records_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ observations_NNS and_CC experience_NN ._.
The_DT tables_NNS at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN each_DT asylum_NN separately_RB ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN each_DT table_NN an_DT abstract_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT asylums_NNS collectively_RB ._.
My_PRP$ own_JJ report_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN with_IN the_DT general_JJ results_NNS deduced_VBD from_IN abstracts_NNS of_IN the_DT forms_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT asylums_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN all_PDT the_DT insanes_NNS treated_VBD out_IN of_IN asylums_NNS ,_, with_IN general_JJ remarks_NNS upon_RB lunacy_NN as_IN seen_VBN in_IN this_DT presidency_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN upon_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT individual_JJ lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS ._.

2_CD ._.

Sanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN is_VBZ not_RB very_RB good_JJ ;_: heavy_JJ and_CC offensive_JJ odours_NNS pervade_VBD the_DT wards_NNS and_CC courts_NNS night_NN and_CC morning_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT weather_NN is_VBZ calm_JJ and_CC sultry_NN ,_, this_DT pecu-_JJ liarity_NN continues_VBZ throughout_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC haunts_VBZ the_DT numerous_JJ corners_NNS of_IN the_DT buildings_NNS in_IN spite_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS careful_JJ use_NN of_IN deodorizing_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG agents_NNS ._.

But_CC when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ borne_VBN in_IN mind_NN that_IN this_DT small_JJ space_NN of_IN ground_NN is_VBZ surrounded_VBN and_CC intersected_VBN by_IN high_JJ walls_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN all_PDT the_DT excreta_NN and_CC washings_NNS of_IN upwards_NNS of_IN 250_CD lunatics_NNS accumulate_JJ daily_JJ and_CC nightly_RB within_IN these_DT walls_NNS ,_, the_DT wonder_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT institution_NN is_VBZ so_RB free_JJ from_IN disease_NN and_CC death_NN ._.
It_PRP can_MD ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, only_RB be_VB accounted_VBN for_IN by_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN high_JJ winds_NNS which_WDT clear_VBP the_DT atmosphere_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT periodic_NN rains_VBZ which_WDT wash_VBZ away_RB all_DT impurities_NNS once_RB every_DT year_NN ._.
Water-supply_NNP ._.
Except_IN during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, the_DT supply_NN of_IN water_NN from_IN the_DT pipes_NNS of_IN the_DT Vehar_NNP Water_NNP Company_NNP is_VBZ at_IN all_DT times_NNS deficient_VBP ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP it_PRP ceases_VBZ altogether_RB ,_, and_CC water_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB brought_VBN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN from_IN some_DT considerable_JJ distance_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN bullock_NN carts_NNS ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, this_DT is_VBZ not_RB a_DT satisfactory_JJ state_NN of_IN things_NNS ,_, and_CC does_VBZ not_RB add_VB to_TO the_DT welfare_NN of_IN an_DT institution_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN ,_, nor_CC in_IN any_DT way_NN diminish_IN the_DT other_JJ sanitary_JJ defects_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

Treatment_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
No_DT particular_JJ kind_NN of_IN treatment_NN is_VBZ pursued_VBN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN insanity_NN arising_VBG from_IN ganja_NN ._.
The_DT acute_NN stage_NN has_VBZ generally_RB passed_VBN away_RP before_IN the_DT patient_NN reaches_VBZ the_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT that_WDT is_VBZ required_VBN is_VBZ to_TO see_VB that_IN the_DT man_NN gets_VBZ plenty_NN of_IN food_NN and_CC is_VBZ kept_VBN clean_JJ and_CC quiet_JJ ._.

On_IN a_DT patient_NN being_VBG brought_VBN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN ,_, he_PRP or_CC she_PRP is_VBZ placed_VBN in_IN a_DT single_JJ room_NN for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS ,_, well_RB washed_VBN ,_, carefully_RB fed_VBN ,_, the_DT state_NN and_CC condition_NN of_IN the_DT excretions_NNS and_CC secretions_NNS examined_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT general_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN noted_VBD ,_, with_IN any_DT particular_JJ ,_, vicious_JJ ,_, or_CC other_JJ propensities_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB observed_VBN ._.

11_CD 4_CD ._.

7_CD ._.

10_CD ._.

17_CD ._.

20_CD ANNUAL_NNP MEDICAL_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ,_, DHARWAR_NNP ,_, FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NN CLOSING_NN MARCH_NNP 31ST_CD ,_, 1874_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN there_RB have_VBP been_VBN admitted_VBN 6_CD patients_NNS :_: 4_CD dementia_NN and_CC 2_CD mania_NN ;_: the_DT deaths_NNS amounting_VBG to_TO 4_CD ,_, divisible_JJ into_IN :_: 1_CD from_IN fever_NN ,_, 2_CD diarrh21_JJ REPORT_NNP BY_NNP DEPUTY_NNP SURGEON-GENERAL_NNP MAITLAND_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP OF_NNP POONA_NNP AND_NNP DHARWAR_NNP ._.
The_DT aggregate_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS remaining_VBG in_IN the_DT Poona_NNP and_CC Dhar-_NNP war_NN Asylums_NNP at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT official_JJ year_NN was_VBD 85_CD ,_, fresh_JJ ad-_JJ missions_NNS 17_CD ;_: making_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN 102_CD insanes_NNS treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 8_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, re-admitted_JJ none_NN ,_, transferred_VBD 3_CD ,_, died_VBD 10_CD ;_: leaving_VBG under_IN treatment_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT 31st_CD March_NNP ,_, 67_CD males_NNS and_CC 14_CD females_NNS ._.
To_TO each_DT report_NN submitted_VBN by_IN superintendents_NNS of_IN asylums_NNS is_VBZ attached_JJ 14_CD tabular_JJ statements_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, when_WRB collated_VBN and_CC compared_VBN with_IN statements_NNS from_IN other_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, will_MD no_DT doubt_NN afford_VBZ valuable_JJ information_NN ._.
At_IN present_JJ some_DT of_IN the_DT forms_NNS appear_VBP complicated_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, attempt_VBP to_TO show_VB too_RB much_JJ from_IN too_RB great_JJ sub-division_NN of_IN small_JJ numbers_NNS ._.
The_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD from_IN forms_NNS 8_CD and_CC 10_CD ,_, showing_VBG the_DT age_NN ,_, caste_NN ,_, and_CC condition_NN of_IN life_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS ,_, would_MD be_VB useful_JJ ,_, had_VBD the_DT statements_NNS been_VBN based_VBN on_IN reliable_JJ data_NNS ,_, which_WDT can_MD hardly_RB be_VB expected_VBN when_WRB we_PRP consider_VBP how_WRB little_JJ really_RB is_VBZ known_VBN of_IN each_DT in-_JJ dividual_NN 's_POS case_NN ._.
For_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN long_RB a_DT subject_NN of_IN complaint_NN ,_, that_IN lunatics_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, are_VBP sent_VBN to_TO asylums_NNS with_IN blank_JJ history_NN sheets_NNS ;_: and_CC instances_NNS are_VBP even_RB recorded_VBN in_IN which_WDT their_PRP$ names_NNS were_VBD unknown_JJ ._.
In_IN support_NN of_IN this_DT state-_JJ ment_NN ,_, I_PRP need_VBP only_RB allude_VBP to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN ,_, out_IN of_IN a_DT total_NN of_IN 105_CD patients_NNS treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, 94_CD ,_, or_CC 92_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, are_VBP labouring_VBG under_IN forms_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, the_DT causes_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS are_VBP ignorant_JJ of_IN ._.
As_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, Government_NNP have_VBP issued_VBN stringent_JJ orders_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN and_CC expect_VBP that_IN hereafter_NN no_DT lunatic_JJ will_MD be_VB forwarded_VBN to_TO an_DT asylum_NN ,_, without_IN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN practicable_JJ ,_, every_DT information_NN regarding_VBG his_PRP$ previous_JJ his-_JJ tory_NN and_CC present_JJ state_NN being_VBG ascertained_VBN and_CC made_VBN known_VBN to_TO the_DT superin-_JJ tendent_NN ,_, the_DT mass_NN of_IN information_NN these_DT statements_NNS are_VBP intended_VBN to_TO supply_VB will_MD in_IN time_NN be_VB full_JJ and_CC complete_JJ ._.
The_DT above_NN remarks_NNS ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, do_VBP not_RB apply_VB to_TO criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ antecedents_NNS are_VBP generally_RB only_RB too_RB well_RB known_VBN ;_: but_CC ,_, unfortunately_RB ,_, not_RB until_IN they_PRP appear_VBP at_IN the_DT bar_NN of_IN justice_NN ,_, accused_VBN of_IN perpetrating_VBG some_DT grievous_JJ assault_NN or_CC cruel_NN murder_NN ._.
POONA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
Since_IN last_JJ report_NN the_DT alterations_NNS and_CC additions_NNS therein_RB recommended_VBD have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP ._.
The_DT long_JJ south_JJ ward_NN has_VBZ been_VBN divided_VBN into_IN two_CD ,_, and_CC a_DT small_JJ adjoining_NN building_NN converted_VBN into_IN two_CD safe_JJ and_CC comfortable_JJ padded_VBN rooms_NNS for_IN refractory_NN patients_NNS ._.
A_DT bathing-shed_JJ has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN put_VBN up_RP for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT females_NNS ;_: which_WDT last_JJ convenience_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, might_MD also_RB be_VB erected_VBN on_IN a_DT larger_JJR scale_NN in_IN the_DT male_NN compound_NN ._.
Additional_JJ accommodation_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ still_RB urgently_RB needed_VBN for_IN male_NN lunatics_NNS ,_, especially_RB for_IN progressing_VBG and_CC convalescent_JJ patients_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ with_IN this_DT object_NN that_IN the_DT superintendent_NN has_VBZ submitted_VBN to_TO Government_NNP ,_, through_IN the_DT visitors_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, a_DT proposal_NN to_TO convert_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT wards_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ civil_JJ hospital_NN ,_, now_RB used_VBN as_IN an_DT office_NN by_IN the_DT assistant_NN collector_NN ,_, into_IN a_DT convalescent_JJ ward_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT way_NN raise_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN sick_JJ to_TO 74_CD ._.
As_IN Government_NNP see_VBP no_DT probability_NN ,_, at_IN present_JJ ,_, of_IN a_DT general_JJ lunatic_JJ asylum_NN being_VBG built_VBN at_IN Poona_NNP ,_, I_PRP strongly_RB recommend_VBP that_IN Dr._NNP Lord_NNP 's_POS sugges-_JJ tions_NNS be_VB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, so_RB soon_RB as_IN office-room_NN can_MD be_VB found_VBN for_IN the_DT collector_NN ._.
22_CD Indeed_RB ,_, every_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ civil_JJ hospital_NN promises_NNS might_MD now_RB ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB repaired_VBN and_CC made_VBN available_JJ for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN insanes_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB concur_VB in_IN Dr._NNP Lord_NNP 's_POS views_NNS that_IN the_DT present_JJ asylum_NN and_CC ground_NN ,_, if_IN altered_VBN and_CC put_VBN into_IN a_DT proper_JJ state_NN of_IN repair_NN ,_, would_MD do_VB away_RB with_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN building_VBG another_DT asylum_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, the_DT present_JJ site_NN does_VBZ not_RB afford_VB that_DT seclusion_NN so_RB ecessary_JJ in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT next_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT ground_NN around_IN it_PRP available_JJ for_IN garden_NN purposes23_NN by_IN superintendents_NNS ,_, should_MD the_DT suggestion_NN meet_NN with_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ._.
At_IN my_PRP$ visits_NNS to_TO the_DT asylum_NN I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN every_DT reason_NN to_TO be_VB satisfied_VBN that_DT ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN practicable_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT present_JJ arrangements_NNS of_IN the_DT ward_NN will_MD admit_VB of_IN ,_, everything_NN is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO ensure_VB order_NN and_CC cleanliness_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT comfort_NN and_CC well-being_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS ;_: and_CC no_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, I_PRP feel_VBP sure_JJ ,_, is_VBZ more_RBR keenly_RB alive_JJ to_TO the_DT disadvantage_NN under_IN which_WDT the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN are_VBP carried_VBN on_IN ,_, or_CC more_RBR zealous_JJ and_CC anxious_JJ to_TO ameliorate_VB the_DT condition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ inmates_NNS ,_, than_IN is_VBZ Dr._NNP Lord_NNP ,_, its_PRP$ present_JJ superintendent_NN ._.
DHARWAR_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
As_IN the_DT prospect_NN of_IN any_DT enlargement_NN being_VBG made_VBN to_TO this_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT civil_JJ hospital_NN to_TO a_DT position_NN nearer_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, some_DT few_JJ years_NNS must_MD yet_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB over_RP before_IN the_DT institution_NN is_VBZ able_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT pressing_NN calls_VBZ made_VBN upon_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN this_DT asylum_NN ,_, 30_CD lunatics_NNS have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN :_: 6_CD of_IN these_DT were_VBD fresh_JJ admissions_NNS ,_, 4_CD have_VBP died_VBN ,_, or_CC 13.3_CD of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO strength_NN ,_, 2_CD transferred_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG 24_CD patients_NNS under_IN treatment_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT room_NN available_JJ in_IN which_WDT the_DT sick_JJ insanes_NNS can_MD be_VB treated_VBN ,_, as_IN obtains_NNS at_IN Poona_NNP ,_, nor_CC is_VBZ a_DT hospital_NN required_VBN at_IN present_NN for_IN the_DT few_JJ sick_NN ,_, who_WP can_MD be_VB very_RB properly_RB attended_VBN to_TO in_IN the_DT night-room_NN ,_, or_CC separate_JJ cells_NNS ,_, on_IN which_WDT principle_NN this_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ built_VBN ._.
At_IN present_JJ there_EX is_VBZ only_RB one_CD criminal_JJ lunatic_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD shortly_RB ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP ,_, be_VB sent_VBN to_TO Bombay_NNP ,_, together_RB with_IN those_DT at_IN Poona_NNP ;_: for_IN no_DT proper_JJ accommodation_NN exists_NNS for_IN that_DT class_NN of_IN insanes_NNS in_IN either_DT of_IN the_DT asylums_NNS in_IN this_DT division_NN ._.
The_DT superintendent_NN states_VBZ that_IN the_DT only_JJ alterations_NNS to_TO this_DT asylum_NN ,_, since_IN the_DT former_JJ report_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT conversion_NN of_IN two_CD cells_NNS into_IN padded_JJ rooms_NNS for_IN refractory_NN patients_NNS ._.
The_DT garden_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT insanes_NNS are_VBP employed_VBN ,_, the_DT superintendent_JJ like-_JJ wise_NN states_NNS ,_, is_VBZ productive_JJ ,_, and_CC supplies_VBZ a_DT fair_JJ quantity_NN of_IN vegetables_NNS daily_RB to_TO the_DT prisoners_NNS ;_: and_CC he_PRP considers_VBZ that_IN this_DT kind_NN of_IN employment_NN is_VBZ ,_, as_IN a_DT remedial_NN or_CC palliative_JJ agent_NN ,_, most_RBS beneficial_JJ to_TO the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
The_DT crowded_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT Dr._NNP Mackenzie_NNP alludes_IN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP afraid_JJ can_MD not_RB be_VB remedied_VBN until_IN the_DT civil_JJ hospital_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN elsewhere_RB ._.
On_IN my_PRP$ inspection_NN in_IN January_NNP last_JJ ,_, I_PRP was_VBD favourably_RB impressed_JJ with_IN the_DT cleanliness_NN ,_, order_NN ,_, and_CC good_JJ arrangement_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT comfort_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS ,_, which_WDT everywhere_RB existed_VBN in_IN this_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT reflects_VBZ credit_NN on_IN the_DT superintendent_NN ._.
24_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATICS_NNP TREATED_NNP IN_NNP CIVIL_NNP ,_, POLICE_NNP ,_, AND_NNP JAIL_NNP HOSPITALS_NNP DURING_NNP THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1873-74_CD There_EX remained_VBN in_IN the_DT civil_JJ hospitals_NNS at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1873-74_JJ 21_CD lunatic_JJ patients_NNS ,_, since_IN admitted_VBN 72_CD ,_, making_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN 95_CD insanes_NNS ;_: 25_CD of_IN these_DT were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 16_CD transferred_VBD to_TO Kolaba_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, 27_CD to_TO friends_NNS ,_, and_CC 4_CD have_VBP died_VBN ,_, leaving_VBG 21_CD still_RB under_IN treatment_NN in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT asylum_NN attached_VBD to_TO the_DT civil_JJ hospital_NN at_IN Kolhapur_NNP ,_, the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN patients_NNS have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN ,_, and_CC still_RB remain_VB under_IN treatment_NN ._.
The_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ built_VBN after_IN the_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT one_NN at_IN Dharwar_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT Kolhapur_NNP State_NNP ,_, and_CC has_VBZ already_RB proved_VBN a_DT most_RBS necessary_JJ and_CC valuable_JJ addition_NN to_TO the_DT civil_JJ hospital_NN ._.
The_DT accommodation_NN assigned_VBD to_TO the_DT lunatic_JJ patients_NNS at_IN the_DT Dhulia_NNP Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP answers_NNS well_RB enough_RB ,_, but_CC an_DT additional_JJ force_NN is_VBZ required_VBN to_TO assist_VB in_IN keeping_VBG in_IN order_NN the_DT excitable_JJ and_CC more_RBR refractory_JJ insanes_NNS ._.
Eight_CD lunatics_NNS still_RB remain_VBP under_IN treatment_NN ._.
At_IN Satara_NNP nothing_NN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN to_TO provide_VB proper_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN insanes_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP still_RB kept_VBN in_IN two_CD side_NN rooms_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT female_JJ hospital_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT separate_JJ building_NN and_CC surrounded_VBN by_IN a_DT wall_NN ,_, an_DT ar-_JJ rangement_NN which_WDT certainly_RB ensures_VBZ the_DT safe_JJ custody_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ,_, but_CC one_CD which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB detrimental_JJ to_TO the_DT comfort_NN and_CC welfare_NN of_IN the_DT female_JJ patients_NNS ._.
In_IN view_NN to_TO remedy_VB this_DT evil_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB proposed_VBN to_TO convert_VB a_DT small_JJ detached_JJ building_NN ,_, situated_VBN at_IN the_DT western_JJ entrance_NN of_IN the_DT compound_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN present_JJ used_VBN as_IN a_DT storeroom_NN ,_, into_IN small_JJ lunatic_JJ wards_NNS ,_, capable_JJ of_IN hold-_JJ ing_VBG four_CD patients_NNS ;_: and_CC I_PRP have_VBP directed_VBN the_DT civil_JJ surgeon_NN to_TO obtain_VB from_IN the_DT executive_NN engineer_VBD a_DT plan_NN and_CC estimate_NN of_IN the_DT alterations_NNS and_CC additions_NNS required_VBN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP at_IN Nasik_NNP is_VBZ a_DT very_RB large_JJ old_JJ building_NN ,_, and_CC quite_RB capable_JJ of_IN affording_VBG room_NN for_IN the_DT insanes_NNS sent_VBD to_TO it_PRP for_IN treatment_NN ._.
Seven_CD patients_NNS have_VBP passed_VBN through_IN the_DT hospital_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: 3_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 1_CD transferred_VBD to_TO Colaba_NNP ,_, and_CC 3_CD to_TO friends_NNS ._.
The_DT Sholapur_NNP Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP affords_VBZ no_DT accommodation_NN whatever_RB for_IN lunatics_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN only_RB 5_CD insanes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN admitted_VBN ,_, and_CC were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT civil_JJ ward_NN with_IN other_JJ patients_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 1_CD was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 3_CD were_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO Kolaba_NNP ,_, 1_CD remained_VBD ._.

ANNUAL_NNP REMARKS_NNP ,_, 1873-74_JJ ,_, SIR_NNP COWASJI_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP HAIDARABAD_NNP ._.

Additional_JJ buildings_NNS for_IN criminals_NNS ._.

Government_NNP gave_VBD their_PRP$ sanction_NN for_IN two_CD additional_JJ wards_NNS being_VBG built_VBN ;_: and_CC I_PRP had_VBD hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT standard_NN plan_NN would_MD be_VB set_VBN aside_RB in_IN favour_NN of_IN thick_JJ cutcha_NN walls_NNS and_CC solid_JJ roofs_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP universally_RB adopted_VBN throughout_IN Sind_NNP ._.

GENERAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, 5th_CD January_NNP 1875_CD ._.
Memorandum_NN from_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
3301_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 14th_CD October_NNP 18742_CD in_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ instances_NNS for_IN reasons_NNS that_WDT are_VBP sufficiently_RB obvious_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_, for_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, in_IN only_RB 54.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
cases_NNS amongst_VBP males_NNS and_CC 58.1_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
amongst_IN the_DT females_NNS have_VBP the_DT causes_NNS been_VBN recorded_VBN ._.
The_DT details_NNS of_IN these_DT are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :3_$ 6_CD ._.
Amongst_NNP Europeans_NNPS insanity_NN was_VBD most_RBS prevalent_JJ between_IN the_DT ages_NNS of_IN 20_CD and_CC 25_CD ,_, there_EX being_VBG 32_CD cases_NNS amongst_JJ men_NNS of_IN that_DT age_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD 25_CD cases_NNS between_IN 25_CD and_CC 30_CD ,_, 15_CD between_IN 30_CD and_CC 35_CD ,_, and_CC 12_CD between_IN 35_CD and_CC 40_CD ,_, leaving_VBG 8_CD cases_NNS ,_, 1_CD of_IN which_WDT was_VBD below_IN 20_CD and_CC 7_CD above_IN 40_CD ._.
Somewhat_RB different_JJ results_NNS are_VBP shown_VBN by_IN the_DT Native_NNP returns_NNS ._.
Out_IN of_IN 705_CD cases_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT ages_NNS are_VBP given_VBN ,_, 99_CD were_VBD between_IN 20_CD and_CC 25_CD ,_, 121_CD between_IN 25_CD and_CC 30_CD ,_, 129_CD between_IN 30_CD and_CC 35_CD ,_, and_CC 119_CD between_IN 35_CD and_CC 40_CD ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN insanity_NN attacks_NNS Europeans_NNPS more_JJR early_JJ than_IN Natives_NNS is_VBZ doubt-_JJ less_RBR due_JJ to_TO climate_VB ._.
As_IN regards_NNS race_NN the_DT Asylum_NNP population_NN was_VBD divided_VBN as_IN follows:4_NN in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ that_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP has_VBZ pointed_VBN out_RP how_WRB very_RB much_RB the_DT Asylums_NNP in_IN this_DT Presidency_NN are_VBP behind_IN those_DT elsewhere_RB ._.
At_IN Colaba_NNP not_RB one_CD European_JJ or_CC Eurasian_JJ or_CC Parsee_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN employed_VBN ,_, while_IN out_IN of_IN a_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN 94.0_CD male_JJ Hindoos_NNP and_CC 49.0_CD male_NN Mussulmans_NNPS ,_, only_RB 26.0_CD and_CC 28.0_CD respectively_RB were_VBD employed_VBN ._.
At_IN Poona_NNP out_IN of_IN a_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN 47.4_CD men_NNS only_RB 6.0_CD ,_, at_IN Dharwar_NNP out_IN of_IN 19.0_CD only_RB 7.0_CD ,_, and_CC at_IN Hy-_NNP derabad_NN out_IN of_IN 82.0_CD only_RB 24.0_CD were_VBD employed_VBN ,_, Out_NNP of_IN 17_CD females_NNS in_IN the_DT last-mentioned_JJ Asylum_NNP 15_CD ,_, and_CC at_IN Ahmedabad_NNP out_IN of_IN 18.8_CD females_NNS 8_CD ,_, were_VBD employed_VBN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ an_DT improvement_NN ._.
But_CC at_IN none_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ Asylums_NNP was_VBD any_DT female_JJ labour_NN made_VBN use_NN of_IN at_IN all_DT ._.
In_IN Ahmedabad_NNP alone_RB do_VBP the_DT results_NNS approach_VBP the_DT mark_NN which_WDT Government_NNP hope_VBP all_DT will_MD reach_VB to_TO in_IN time_NN ._.
At_IN that_DT Asylum_NNP out_IN of_IN a_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN 87_CD males_NNS 61.6_CD were_VBD employed_VBN re-_JJ gularly_NN ._.
The_DT Resolution_NNP on_IN the_DT Report_NNP for_IN 1872-73_JJ ,_, in_IN which_WDT attention_NN was_VBD called_VBN to_TO the_DT necessity_NN of_IN increasing_VBG the_DT Lunatics_NNP '_POS employment_NN ,_, was_VBD issued_VBN too_RB late_JJ for_IN any_DT reforms_NNS to_TO take_VB place_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN now_RB under_IN consideration_NN (_( 1873-74_JJ )_) ,_, and_CC Government_NNP will_MD only_RB again_RB express_VB a_DT hope_NN that_IN the_DT injunc-_JJ tions_NNS they_PRP have_VBP issued_VBN will_MD be_VB gradually_RB acted_VBN up_RP to_TO ._.
Government_NN are_VBP aware_JJ that_IN the_DT space_NN at_IN Colaba_NNP is_VBZ too_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Asylum_NNP too_RB crowded_VBD to_TO allow_VB any_DT extensive_JJ work_NN being_VBG undertaken_JJ ,_, but_CC are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN more_JJR might_MD be_VB done_VBN ;_: while_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP at_IN Hyderabad_NNP was_VBD expressly_RB placed_VBN in_IN an_DT otherwise_RB objectionable_JJ site_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN that_IN the_DT extensive_JJ garden_NN around_IN it_PRP might_MD afford_VB occupation_NN to_TO the_DT Lunatics_NNPS ._.
In_IN reference_NN to_TO this_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO find_VB that_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP has_VBZ com-_NN menced_VBN putting_VBG the_DT men_NNS to_TO labour_VB in_IN the_DT garden_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP hopes_VBZ before_IN long_JJ to_TO remove_VB most_JJS of_IN the_DT defects_NNS of_IN the_DT site_NN ._.
Undoubtedly_RB the_DT present_JJ report_NN shows_VBZ a_DT great_JJ improvement_NN in_IN this_DT Asylum_NNP over_IN the_DT year_NN before_RB ._.
Arrangements_NNS are_VBP now_RB in_IN progress_NN for_IN the_DT better_JJR employment_NN of_IN the_DT Lunatics_NNS at_IN Poona_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT Dharwar_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, with_IN respect_NN to_TO which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN last_JJ year_NN that_IN the_DT inmates_NNS were_VBD largely_RB employed_VBN in_IN gardening_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB stated_VBN that_IN only_RB 7_CD out_IN of_IN 24_CD can_MD be_VB trusted_VBN on_IN that_DT work_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT attempt_NN to_TO employ_VB the_DT remainder_NN in-doors_NNS has_VBZ apparently_RB been_VBN made_VBN ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT reason_NN why_WRB grinding_VBG corn_NN at_IN least_JJS should_MD not_RB be_VB undertaken_VBN here_RB ,_, as_IN elsewhere_RB ._.
10_CD ._.

18_CD ._.
Government_NNP regret_VBZ that_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ Asylum_NNP ,_, that_WDT at_IN Cola-_NNP ba_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB so_RB deficient_JJ in_IN room_NN ,_, an_DT evil_NN which_WDT ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN said_VBD ,_, prevents_NNS ,_, to_TO a_DT very_RB great_JJ extent_NN ,_, the_DT proper_JJ employment_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, tends_NNS to_TO foster_VB disease_NN from_IN excessive_JJ crowding_NN ,_, and_CC stands_VBZ in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN the_DT proper_JJ segre-_JJ gation_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ classes_NNS of_IN Insanes_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN also_RB that_IN the_DT water-supply_NN is_VBZ very_RB bad_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT proper_JJ Hospital_NNP is_VBZ needed_VBN ._.

At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, with_IN claims_NNS on_IN them_PRP from_IN all_DT quarters_NNS ,_, they_PRP do_VBP not_RB feel_VB them-_JJ selves_NNS in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO make_VB any_DT change_NN at_IN present_JJ ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO those_DT which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN out_IN of_IN late_JJ years_NNS ._.
In_IN default_NN of_IN a_DT comprehensive_JJ scheme_NN of_IN Central_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP ,_, the_DT plan_NN which_WDT it_PRP would_MD seem_VB advisable_JJ ulti-_JJ mately_RB to_TO carry_VB out_RP would_MD be_VB the_DT conversion_NN of_IN the_DT Colaba_NNP Asylum_NNP into_IN a_DT house_NN for_IN incurable_JJ Lunatics_NNS ,_, the_DT establishment_NN at_IN which_WDT it_PRP would_MD cost_VB comparative-_JJ ly_NN little_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT erection_NN of_IN another_DT Asylum_NNP at_IN some_DT suitable_JJ and_CC cheap_JJ place_NN like_IN Poona_NNP ,_, where_WRB space_NN could_MD be_VB had_VBN ,_, and_CC cures_NNS could_MD be_VB effected_VBN ._.

Under_IN the_DT smaller_JJR scheme_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN adverted_VBN to_TO ,_, the_DT accommodation_NN reserved_VBD at_IN Colaba_NNP for_IN Military_NNP Lu-_NNP natics_NNS who_WP come_VBP to_TO Bombay_NNP for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN prior_JJ to_TO departure_VB by_IN the_DT Troop-_NNP ships_NNS would_MD not_RB need_VB to_TO be_VB disturbed._VBN ,_, Government_NNP believe_VBP such_PDT an_DT arrange-_JJ ment_NN would_MD be_VB a_DT really_RB economical_JJ measure_NN ,_, as_IN cures_NNS would_MD be_VB sooner_JJR effect-_JJ ed_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT New_NNP Asylum_NNP were_VBD amalgamated_VBN with_IN one_CD now_RB existing_VBG ,_, the_DT in-_NN creased_VBD cost_NN of_IN establishment_NN would_MD be_VB but_CC small_JJ ._.
The_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN asked_VBN to_TO consider_VB whether_IN the_DT institution_NN of_IN a_DT Private_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN patients_NNS able_JJ to_TO pay_VB for_IN their_PRP$ maintenance_NN is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ with_IN so_RB many_JJ Native_NNP Graduates_NNP competent_NN to_TO undertake_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC if_IN this_DT be_VB found_VBN feasi-_JJ ble_JJ ,_, it_PRP will_MD help_VB to_TO relieve_VB the_DT State_NNP Asylums_NNP ._.
19_CD ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT water-supply_NN at_IN Colaba_NNP is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ patent_JJ that_IN nothing_NN can_MD be_VB done_VBN until_IN the_DT scheme_NN for_IN supplying_VBG the_DT town_NN separately_RB with_IN water_NN from_IN the_DT Toolsee_NNP Lake_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP ._.
20_CD ._.
The_DT system_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT workshop_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN at_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, at_IN the_DT risk_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, is_VBZ decidedly_RB bad_JJ ,_, and_CC His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Coun-_NNP 8_CD cil_NN can_MD not_RB but_CC feel_VB surprised_JJ that_IN it_PRP should_MD have_VB been_VBN allowed_VBN to_TO continue_VB so_RB long_RB ._.
The_DT balance_NN at_IN the_DT credit_NN of_IN the_DT Fund_NNP should_MD be_VB paid_VBN in_IN to_TO Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN this_DT ,_, as_IN all_DT other_JJ Asylums_NNP ,_, should_MD budget_NN annually_RB for_IN the_DT sum_NN required_VBN to_TO be_VB expended_VBN in_IN materials_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC the_DT re-_JJ ceipts_NNS he_PRP expects_VBZ to_TO obtain_VB ._.

Buildings_NNS ,_, Alterations_NNS ,_, and_CC Improvements_NNS ._.

DHARWAR_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ contiguous_JJ to_TO the_DT civil_JJ hospital_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ a_DT very_RB poor_JJ place_NN indeed_RB ,_, affording_VBG very_RB miserable_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN about_IN 18_CD insanes_NNS ;_: as_IN compared_VBN with_IN any_DT of_IN our_PRP$ other_JJ asylums_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ by_IN far_RB the_DT least_JJS suited_JJ for_IN its_PRP$ purposes_NNS ._.

The_DT two_CD day-rooms_NNS are_VBP for_IN the_DT separation_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS ._.
The_DT male_NN day-room_NN has_VBZ 7,950_CD cubic_JJ feet_NNS of_IN air_NN and_CC the_DT female_JJ 5,300_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP small_JJ court-yards_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT patients_NNS take_VBP air_NN and_CC as_RB much_JJ exercise_NN as_IN such_JJ a_DT limited_JJ space_NN can_MD allow_VB of_IN ._.
In_IN these_DT small_JJ courts_NNS there_EX are_VBP two_CD privies_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN females_NNS and_CC the_DT other_JJ for_IN males_NNS ,_, and_CC on_IN either_DT side_NN the_DT range_NN of_IN cells_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ 12_CD feet_NNS by_IN 10_CD and_CC 11_CD 1/4_CD feet_NNS high_JJ :_: so_RB each_DT contains_VBZ 1,350_CD cubic_JJ feet_NNS of_IN air_NN ._.
The_DT ventilation_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB good_JJ both_DT in_IN the_DT cells_NNS and_CC day-rooms_NNS ._.
Two_CD of_IN the_DT cells_NNS are_VBP padded_VBN rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC used_VBD for_IN refractory_JJ patients_NNS ._.
Padded_VBN rooms_NNS in_IN India_NNP are_VBP objection-_JJ able_JJ ,_, as_IN they_PRP give_VBP cover_NN to_TO vermin_VB ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN they_PRP are_VBP now_RB little_JJ used_VBN anywhere_RB ._.
The_DT accommodation_NN is_VBZ not_RB equal_JJ to_TO the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT year_NN many_JJ applications_NNS for_IN admission_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB refused_VBN ._.
Unsuitability_NN of_IN this_DT Asylum_NNP ._.
76_CD ._.

I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO report_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT mention_NN of_IN restraint_NN having_VBG been_VBN resorted_VBN to_TO ,_, except_IN at_IN Hyderabad_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT case_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN of_IN the_DT mildest_JJS character_NN 9_CD COLA'BA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.

5.The_CD average_JJ daily_JJ number_NN of_IN employed_JJ lunatics_NNS has_VBZ risen_VBN this_DT year_NN from_IN 238_CD to_TO 277_CD ,_, and_CC though_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN their_PRP$ employ-_JJ ment_NN can_MD not_RB of_IN course_NN be_VB remunerative_JJ ,_, still_RB the_DT benefit_NN to_TO the_DT in-_JJ sanes_NNS is_VBZ marked_VBN ._.

Population_NN ._.
2.Taking_VBG the_DT statements_NNS first_RB ,_, No_NNP ._.
1_CD shows_NNS that_IN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN the_DT total_JJ asylum_NN population_NN was_VBD 846_CD as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 874_CD for_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ,_, a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 28_CD ._.
Of_IN Admissions_NNS and_CC Re-ad-_JJ missions_NNS ._.
this_DT total_JJ 697_CD were_VBD males_NNS and_CC 149_CD females_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1876_CD there_EX remained_VBD 464_CD males_NNS and_CC 104_CD females_NNS ,_, a_DT total_NN of_IN 568_CD ;_: and_CC there_EX were_VBD admitted_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN 223_CD males_NNS and_CC 41_CD females_NNS ,_, a_DT total_NN of_IN 264_CD ._.
The_DT re-admissions_NNS Discharged_NNP ._.
were_VBD 10_CD males_NNS and_CC 4_CD females_NNS ._.

5.The_CD percentages_NNS to_TO the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN were_VBD 3_CD recovered_VBN ,_, 2_CD improved_VBN ,_, and_CC 4_CD died_VBD ._.
For_IN melancholia_$ 60_CD cases_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN ;_: 2_CD of_IN them_PRP recovered_VBD ,_, 1_CD improved_VBN ,_, and_CC 2_CD died_VBD ._.

Causes_NNS of_IN Insanity_NNP ._.
11.Statements_CD No_DT ._.
7_CD show_NN the_DT alleged_JJ causes_NNS of_IN insanity_NN so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP can_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN ._.

83,795-1-4_JJ ._.

5.The_CD total_JJ credit_NN and_CC profit_NN on_IN employment_NN and_CC manufactures_NNS has_VBZ somewhat_RB increased_VBN ,_, but_CC Government_NNP do_VBP not_RB look_VB to_TO the_DT gain_NN financially_RB so_RB much_JJ as_IN to_TO the_DT great_JJ benefit_NN derived_VBN by_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS from_IN employment_NN ._.

SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP on_IN the_DT Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP of_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1877_CD ._.
Number_NNP and_CC comparative_JJ size_NN of_IN the_DT asylums_NNS ._.
2.The_CD asylums_NNS under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN this_DT department_NN are_VBP five_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, Colaba_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP ,_, Dharwar_NNP ,_, Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, and_CC Hyderabad_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ is_VBZ in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT Super-_JJ intendent_NN specially_RB appointed_VBN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT others_NNS the_DT respective_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP at_IN the_DT stations_NNS are_VBP the_DT Superintendents_NNS ._.
Colaba_NNP ,_, the_DT largest_JJS and_CC most_RBS important_JJ of_IN these_DT institutions_NNS ,_, had_VBD ,_, during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, an_DT average_JJ daily_JJ strength_NN of_IN 288.0_CD inmates_NNS ;_: Hyderabad_NNP comes_VBZ next_JJ with_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 115.0_CD ,_, then_RB follow_VB Ahmedabad_NNP with_IN 108.1_CD ,_, Poona_NNP with_IN 66.8_CD ,_, and_CC Dharwar_NNP with_IN 21.0_CD ._.
From_IN these_DT figures_NNS an_DT idea_NN of_IN their_PRP$ comparative_JJ sizes_NNS may_MD be_VB gathered_VBN ._.
The_DT separate_JJ reports_NNS of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNP ,_, which_WDT are_VBP printed_VBN in_IN full_JJ ,_, give_VB in_IN detail_NN all_DT necessary_JJ information_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN each_DT asylum_NN ._.

3.Statements_CD No_DT ._.
1_CD furnish_JJ various_JJ particulars_NNS regarding_VBG admissions_NNS and_CC discharges_NNS ;_: it_PRP shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT total_JJ asylum_NN po-_JJ pulation_NN was_VBD ,_, for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, 869_CD ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 846_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT total_NN was_VBD composed_VBN of_IN 717_CD males_NNS and_CC 152_CD females_NNS ._.
There_EX remained_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1877_CD ,_, 469_CD males_NNS and_CC 113_CD females_NNS ,_, a_DT total_NN of_IN 582_CD ;_: the_DT new_JJ admissions_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN numbered_VBD 240_CD males_NNS and_CC 34_CD females_NNS ,_, and_CC 8_CD males_NNS and_CC 5_CD females_NNS were_VBD re-admitted.The_JJ total_JJ number_NN of_IN discharges_NNS from_IN the_DT asylums_NNS were_VBD 205_CD males_NNS and_CC 35_CD females_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT 81_CD males_NNS and_CC 18_CD females_NNS were_VBD cured_VBN ;_: of_IN 117_CD males_NNS and_CC 16_CD females_NNS transferred_VBN to_TO friends_NNS 82_CD of_IN the_DT former_JJ and_CC 11_CD of_IN the_DT latter_NN had_VBD undergone_JJ improvement_NN to_TO some_DT extent_NN ,_, while_IN 35_CD males_NNS and_CC 5_CD females_NNS were_VBD thus_RB transferred_VBN without_IN having_VBG made_VBN any_DT advance_NN towards_NNS recovery_NN ._.

asylums_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT eighth_NN was_VBD an_DT escape_NN from_IN Ahmedabad.The_NNP mortality_NN has_VBZ been_VBN greater_JJR ._.

Superintendent.10_NNP Comparison_NNP between_IN the_DT present_JJ and_CC previous_JJ year_NN ._.
5.The_CD number_NN remaining_VBG on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1877_CD shows_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN 4_CD ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT number_NN on_IN the_DT same_JJ date_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT admissions_NNS fell_VBD short_JJ by_IN 15_CD ,_, the_DT re-admissions_NNS are_VBP the_DT same_JJ ._.
Amongst_IN these_DT were_VBD a_DT male_NN and_CC female_NN who_WP were_VBD discharged_VBN and_CC re-admitted_JJ three_CD times_NNS in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN was_VBD 232.2_CD males_NNS and_CC 55.8_CD females_NNS ,_, total_JJ 2880_CD ._.

11.The_CD average_JJ period_NN of_IN detention_NN of_IN each_DT lunatic_NN who_WP recovered_VBD was_VBD 10_CD months_NNS and_CC 8_CD days_NNS ,_, the_DT maximum_JJ being_VBG 4_CD years_NNS and_CC 9_CD months_NNS and_CC 6_CD days_NNS ,_, the_DT minimum_JJ 1_CD month_NN ._.

Causes_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ._.
12.Statements_CD No_DT ._.
7_CD show_VBP the_DT causes_NNS of_IN insanity_NN so_RB far_RB as_IN could_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN known_JJ causes_NNS was_VBD 243_CD to_TO 203_CD unknown_JJ ._.
The_DT known_VBN causes_NNS are_VBP divided_VBN ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, into_IN the_DT physical_JJ and_CC moral_JJ ,_, these_DT agents_NNS are_VBP however_RB so_RB combined_VBN in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN instances_NNS that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO give_VB to_TO either_DT their_PRP$ relative_JJ value_NN as_IN they_PRP seldom_VBP act_JJ singly_RB ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS ,_, and_CC more_JJR parti-_JJ cularly_NN among_IN the_DT males_NNS ,_, one_CD rarely_RB sees_VBZ a_DT case_NN of_IN insanity_NN of_IN purely_RB moral_JJ origin_NN ._.
The_DT effect_NN is_VBZ frequently_RB made_VBN to_TO supply_VB the_DT place_NN of_IN the_DT cause_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT early_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN insanity_NN are_VBP often_RB mistaken_VBN for_IN that_DT which_WDT has_VBZ pro-_NN duced_VBD them_PRP ;_: thus_RB insanity_NN may_MD assume_VB the_DT form_NN of_IN religious_JJ mania_NN or_CC melancholy_NN ,_, the_DT origin_NN of_IN which_WDT may_MD be_VB intemperance_NN or_CC self-abuse_NN ._.
Again_NNP poverty_NN ,_, grief_NN ,_, and_CC domestic_JJ troubles_NNS are_VBP generally_RB associated_VBN with_IN physical_JJ impairment_NN ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT physical_JJ causes_NNS 53_CD cases_NNS are_VBP attributed_VBN to_TO ganja_VB ,_, 28_CD to_TO spirits_NNS ,_, and_CC 3_CD to_TO opium_NN ._.
Fever_NNP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN the_DT exciting_VBG cause_NN in_IN 10_CD cases_NNS ,_, previous_JJ attack_NN in_IN 18_CD ,_, hereditary_JJ predisposition_NN and_CC congenital_NN in_IN 21_CD ,_, destitution_NN 19_CD ,_, epilepsy_NN 16_CD ,_, disorder_NN of_IN parturition_NN 5_CD ,_, injury_NN to_TO head_VB 12_CD ,_, climate_NN 7_CD ,_, and_CC masturbation_NN 5_CD ._.
Of_IN moral_JJ causes_NNS domestic_JJ troubles_NNS were_VBD those_DT most_RBS frequently_RB assigned_VBN and_CC account_NN for_IN 24_CD cases_NNS ._.
Religious_JJ excitement_NN was_VBD assigned_VBN as_IN a_DT cause_NN in_IN 4_CD cases_NNS ,_, study_NN in_IN 4_CD ,_, and_CC fright_VBD in_IN 3_CD ._.
Sickness_NN and_CC mortality_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
Considering_VBG the_DT depressed_JJ physical_JJ and_CC mental_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT majo-_JJ rity_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, the_DT general_JJ health_NN has_VBZ been_VBN comparatively_RB satisfactory_JJ ;_: the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS into_IN hospital_NN ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, shows_VBZ a_DT decline_NN of_IN 153_CD ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN last_JJ year_NN ;_: the_DT decline_NN is_VBZ chiefly_VBN in_IN fever_NN ;_: bronchitis_NN and_CC bowel_NN complaints_NNS were_VBD also_RB less_RBR prevalent_JJ ;_: the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD chiefly_NN confined_VBN to_TO the_DT aged_VBN and_CC infirm_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 19_CD deaths_NNS ,_, no_DT fewer_JJR than_IN 10_CD are_VBP recorded_VBN under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN debility_NN ;_: 6_CD of_IN these_DT had_VBD been_VBN on_IN an_DT average_NN over_IN 16_CD years_NNS in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
A_DT European_JJ female_NN ,_, an_DT old_JJ resident_NN ,_, died_VBD of_IN phthisis_NN ;_: 2_CD deaths_NNS resulted_VBD from_IN epilepsy_NN ,_, one_CD from_IN traumatic_JJ erysipelas_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD patient_NN sank_NN from_IN exhaustion_NN consequent_NN on_IN maniacal_JJ excitment_NN ;_: dysentery_NN and_CC diarrh12_VB 1_CD ``_`` not_RB improved_VBN ''_'' was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO England_NNP ,_, and_CC 1_CD died_VBD ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN was_VBD 47.8_CD males_NNS and_CC 2.2_CD females_NNS ;_: of_IN these_DT 53.1_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN males_NNS and_CC 89.68_CD of_IN females_NNS were_VBD daily_JJ employed_VBN ._.
Their_PRP$ crimes_NNS were_VBD murder_NN ,_, 30_CD males_NNS and_CC 2_CD females_NNS ;_: voluntarily_RB causing_VBG grievous_JJ hurt_NN ,_, 7_CD males_NNS ,_, 5_CD mischief_NN ,_, 2_CD house-breaking_NN ,_, 1_CD piracy_NN and_CC assault_NN ;_: 10_CD males_NNS and_CC 1_CD female_NN theft_NN ,_, 1_CD culpable_JJ homicide_NN not_RB amounting_VBG to_TO murder_VB ,_, and_CC 1_CD rape_NN ._.
I_PRP wish_VBP to_TO call_VB particular_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX are_VBP at_IN present_JJ certain_JJ criminals_NNS who_WP have_VBP quite_RB recovered_VBN and_CC are_VBP now_RB perfectly_RB sane_NN and_CC do_VBP not_RB require_VB any_DT further_JJ treatment_NN in_IN an_DT asylum_NN These_DT cases_NNS are_VBP a_DT con-_JJ stant_JJ source_NN of_IN anxiety_NN and_CC responsibility_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP constantly_RB plotting_VBG and_CC endeavouring_VBG to_TO escape_VB ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN they_PRP have_VBP to_TO be_VB treated_VBN as_IN lunatics_NNS ,_, they_PRP seldom_VBP or_CC never_RB can_MD be_VB got_VBN to_TO work_VB ,_, thus_RB setting_VBG a_DT bad_JJ example_NN not_RB only_RB in_IN this_DT res-_JJ pect_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB by_IN inciting_VBG the_DT lunatic_JJ patients_NNS to_TO give_VB trouble_NN and_CC not_RB to_TO work_VB ._.
General_NNP management_NN ._.
